1.title: #Psychology'd
1.plot: Kevin explains to Jane what marriage is like from a man's perspective. And Ralphie shows his sensitive side when it comes to Rosanna.

2.title: #EmotionalConnection
2.plot: Ralphie's tough exterior is cracked by the former love of his life, Rosanna. And Pierce is asked to go the extra mile.

3.title: #ThatsWhatFriendsR4
3.plot: Pierce and Imani have their first date but only one of them knew about it. And Kevin receives a stressful call from his mother.

4.title: #Fudgesicle
4.plot: Per Ralphie's suggestion, Kevin and Jane get professional help but get more than they bargained for. And Ralphie sees a Ghost of Happiness Past.

5.title: #TheFollowing
5.plot: With the help of Dr. Dinkle, Ralphie "not so" randomly pops into Rosanna's everyday life, making their interactions more and more awkward. And Pierce tries to Like his way back into Imani's life.

6.title: #UnPierced
6.plot: Fatherly advice leads Pierce to profess his love for Imani, while a early morning visit from an old friend may turn his world upside down.

7.title: #HeardItThruTheGreatVine
7.plot: In honor of Nation Friendship Day, Kevin and Jane host a Vine Themed House Warming Party, inviting past characters to partake in the festivities. A celebration that ultimately leave our lead characters in a state of Flux.

8.title: #HeardItThruTheGreatVineToo
8.plot: In honor of Nation Friendship Day, Kevin and Jane host a Vine Themed House Warming Party, inviting past characters to partake in the festivities. A celebration that ultimately leave our lead characters in a state of Flux.

imdb.plot outline: In a world of status updates, tweets, likes, & posts can anyone get this relationship thing right? Best friends; Kevin, Ralphie, and Pierce thought they were winning at dating... KEVIN is "in a relationship" with Jane according to Facebook. Jane however, wants to change her status to "married". The problem: Kevin doesn't LIKE the idea of marriage. RALPHIE, thanks to TINDER, Mr. I'm not a player, I just crush-a-lot" has a rotation of women at his disposal but he'd dump them all to get back with his ex, Rosanna. The problem: he SWIPED her to the left. PIERCE is celibate for Jesus. The poster boy for ChristianMingle.com, he is every church girl's dream man. Haunted by a recurring No-So Wet Dream, and smitten by his newly single "Female Best Friend" Imani, he might be forced to UPDATE his godly profile. Come #share in Kevin, Ralphie, and Pierce's dating adventures & #follow them as they go "In Search of Wifey in a WiFi World."
